name: Demojack [Prototype]
description:
This is quite literally a playtest of a game idea I had been playing with for awhile now, I'm still not sure how I actually feel about it.

Press ENTER on the menu to start the game.
F1 - Fullscreen.
W.A.S.D for controls.

Hold down space to pick up bombs & release space to fling a bomb in a certain direction. Bomb speed is based on player movement speed + direction.

If this seems fun, I will continue to add to it, but I need third party input :P
